general.semesterNote: The semester is a specific period during which academic subjects are taught. For example, the semester might be named Spring 2025 or Summer 2025, and so on.
general.semesterArFieldNote: The semester name in Arabic. For example, ربيع ٢٠٢٥ or صيف ٢٠٢٥, and so on.
general.semesterEnFieldNote: The semester name in English. For example, Spring 2025 or Summer 2025, and so on.
general.pricePerHourNote: Price per hour in Omani Rial (for part-time teachers)

general.defaultPasswordNote: Note: If a student is newly created by the teacher and has not joined the platform before, their initial password will be set to the email’s local part. For example, for “12345678@anataleb.com” the password will be “12345678.”

getStarted.title: Let's get started
getStarted.subtitle: Practice and host our top choices to boost student engagement.

explore.title: Explore more recommended resources for teachers

topbar.text: Designed for schools in low-resource and conflict-affected areas

hero.title: Manage, teach, and learn — smarter and faster
hero.subtitle: We’re a nonprofit with a mission to provide free, world-class education for anyone, anywhere.

features.title: Everything you need to run learning at scale
features.kicker: Five roles. One simple, secure platform.

institutions.title: Institutions
institutions.desc: Programs, classes, courses, policies, attendance, and analytics.

teachers.title: Teachers
teachers.desc: Manage classes, assignments, quizzes, media content, and feedback.

students.title: Students
students.desc: Personalized paths, results & certificates, and low-data learning.

parents.title: Parents
parents.desc: Track progress, attendance, and alerts — with a simple Arabic UI.

case.title: Built with — and for — schools in conflict zones
case.text: ANATALEB is open and free. Our mission is to keep learning going, even with low connectivity and power cuts.

outcomes.title: Learner outcomes on ANATALEB
outcomes.description: such as new skills, increased pay, and new job opportunities.

teachers.label: TEACHERS
teachers.title: Differentiate your classroom and engage every student.
teachers.description: We empower teachers to support their entire classroom. 90% of teachers who have used ANATALEB have found us effective.
